remove-default-project-option.description: Remove 'defaultProject' option from workspace configuration. The project to use will be determined from the current working directory.

replace-default-collection-option.description: Replace removed 'defaultCollection' option in workspace configuration with 'schematicCollections'.

update-server-builder-config.description: Update the '@angular-devkit/build-angular:server' builder configuration to disable 'buildOptimizer' for non optimized builds.
